See all you can do with Lyft Business
Once you sign up, you'll get access to Lyft Business admin platform, where we'll help you set up a ride program that's more affordable than your current options, rewards your riders with Lyft credit, and gives you instant visibility into your org's ride spend.
 
 
CONTINUE SIGNUP
 
 
Cut costs, not corners
Keep an eye on your ground transportation budget with detailed reports on ride spend.
 
You've got the hook up
Your team members can earn $5 in personal credit for every 5 business rides they take, plus hotel and airline points.
 
Get in-person help, whenever
We're standing by, ready to answer your phone calls, respond to your emails, and even take you out to lunch when we're in your neck of the woods.
 
 
 
Want to talk to a real human?
We meant what we said – we're here for you. Get in touch ›
